title: Silver Surfer: Requiem (Trade Paperback)
description:
The Silver Surfer’s final voyage! For untold years, Norrin Radd has surfed the galaxy, exploring the darkness between stars, witnessing the rise and fall of vast civilizations. Now, his ride is about to come to an end. It starts with a small spot – a blemish that will spread until he is no more. Until then, the Silver Surfer would undertake his final voyage – to the one destination that has always eluded him.
Collecting SILVER SURFER: REQUIEM #1-4.
Rated T+ …$14.99
ISBN: 978-0-7851-1796-4
